document_data.name: Pete
document_data.mainbody: '''Pickled Pete''' was an old drunk handyman who worked in region of the [[Sword Coast North]] near [[Phandalin]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He had an awful memory, and legitimately could not remember his own surname.
document_data.Personality: Pete was a creative individual when it came to his work. He loved finding new ways to solve problems and get the job done.
document_data.Activities: He loved his ale, and actually seemed to work better when inebriated rather than sober.
document_data.Relationships: Despite his flaws, Pickled Pete was a helpful man, whom his friends could truly rely on.
